name: A visored brass helmet dripping with green ooze
data: It increases the users strength a bit.
It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution somewhat.
It has adequate armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users hitpoints like a god.
It allows the user to see in darkness.
It allows the user to see magical auras.
It allows the user to see invisible.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users acid resistance a bit.
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
It increases the users poison resistance a bit.
